com.africanbongo.clearskyes.util

Class WeatherJsonUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.africanbongo.clearskyes.util.WeatherJsonUtil

  • public final class WeatherJsonUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used to parse host server Weather JSONObject(s) into:
    • WeatherToday object
    • WeatherObject object
    • WeatherDay object
    • WeatherHour object
    • AstroElement object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String generateURL(java.lang.String location, int days)
      Generate the url used to get data from the Weather API

      Parses a JSONObject object into a local AstroElement object
      static WeatherDay parseIntoWeatherDay(org.json.JSONObject json)
      Parses a JSONObject into a local WeatherDay object

      Parses a JSONObject object into a WeatherHour[]

      Parses a JSONObject into a local WeatherObject object

      • parseIntoAstroElement

        public static AstroElement parseIntoAstroElement(org.json.JSONObject json)
                                          throws org.json.JSONException
        Parses a JSONObject object into a local AstroElement object
        Parameters:
        json - JSONObject containing AstroElement values in them
        Returns:
        AstroElement containing astronomy values
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if JSONObject doesn't contain AstroElement members, or if there's an error in parsing

      • parseIntoWeatherHourArray

        public static WeatherHour[] parseIntoWeatherHourArray(org.json.JSONObject json)
                                               throws org.json.JSONException
        Parses a JSONObject object into a WeatherHour[]
        Parameters:
        json - JSONObject containing a JSONArray with WeatherHour elements
        Returns:
        WeatherHour[] containing all the WeatherHour objects parsed
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if JSONObject doesn't contain JSONArray with WeatherHour members, or if there's an error in parsing
